text: Kawika Shoji (born November 11, 1987) is an American volleyball player, a member of United States men's national volleyball team, gold medalist of the 2014 World League and 2015 World Cup. ==Personal life== Kawika's parents are Dave and Mary Shoji. His younger brother Erik Shoji is also a player (libero) for the United States men's national team.Shoji Brothers, Kawika and Erik are USA Volleyball Newsmakers – asianplayers.com In 2014 he married to Megan. On March 16, 2018 their daughter Ada–Jean Ehiku Shoji was born in Milan, Italy. ==Sporting achievements== * CEV Champions League **16px 2014/2015, with Berlin Recycling Volleys * National championships ** 2010/2011 16px Finnish Championship, with Tampereen Isku-Volley ** 2011/2012 16px German Championship, with Berlin Recycling Volleys ** 2012/2013 16px German Championship, with Berlin Recycling Volleys ** 2013/2014 16px German Championship, with Berlin Recycling Volleys ** 2014/2015 16px German Championship, with Berlin Recycling Volleys ** 2015/2016 16px Turkish Championship, with Arkas Izmir ** 2016/2017 16px Russian Championship, with Lokomotiv Novosibirsk * National team ** 2012 16px Pan American Cup ** 2014 16px FIVB World League ** 2015 16px FIVB World League ** 2015 16px FIVB World Cup ** 2016 16px Olympic Games ** 2017 16px NORCECA Championship ** 2018 16px FIVB Nations League ** 2018 16px FIVB World Championship ** 2019 16px FIVB Nations League ==References== ==External links== *Stanford player profile *FIVB profile *Team USA profile *PlusLiga player profile Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Honolulu Category:Stanford Cardinal men's volleyball players Category:American men's volleyball players Category:Olympic volleyball players of the United States Category:Volleyball players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:American people of Japanese descent Category:American sportspeople of Japanese descent Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States in volleyball Category:American expatriate sportspeople in Finland Category:American expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:American expatriate sportspeople in Turkey Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Germany Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Turkey Category:Arkas Spor volleyball players Category:Resovia Rzeszów players
title: Kawika Shoji
